resign.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
resign.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Tom has since resigned his membership of the golf club.
She resigned from the government last week.
He resigned as governor of Punjab in August.
resign.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: He later resigned his post as Minister of Energy.
A majority of voters think he should resign his seat in Congress.
Richard Nixon resigned the presidency in 1974.
Mr Hunt announced that he has resigned his chairmanship of the committee.
He recently resigned his membership of the National Rifle Association.
resign.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to officially leave a job, position etc through your own choice, rather than being told to leave
resign.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The vice-president resigned hispost last week.
One director recently resigned as trustee of the fund.
He has resigned from the board for personal reasons.
